title: Kaatril Oru Rajaali Song Lyrics Dhuruvangal Pathinaaru
stanzas:
Kaatril oru rajali
kannil indru thedal ondru
neril unnai parthaale
vettaiyaadum vegam kondu

moolai theya velai parkkum
naalai paarthu
aalai saikkum
thittam pottu
thatti thookkum
ottam kaattaadhe

ettu thikkilum
utru paarkume
endha neramum
unnai thookkumae
thappi poga
engum paadhai illai

aattam ini kaattaathe
sangil vanthu
kaalai vaikkum
thookkam ini vaaraathe
achcham unnai
aatti vaikkum

ettu thikkilum
utru paarkume
endha neramum
unnai thookkumae
thappi poga
engum paadhai illai

ettu thikkilum
utru paarkume
endha neramum
unnai thookkumae
thappi poga
engum paadhai illai
